articles.title: WORLD: OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma pleads guilty in criminal case
articles.description: In a virtual hearing with a federal judge in Newark, New Jersey, the OxyContin maker admitted impeding the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration's efforts to combat the addiction crisis
articles.content:
In a virtual hearing with a federal judge in Newark, New Jersey, the OxyContin maker admitted impeding the U.S. Drug Enforcement Administration's efforts to combat the addiction crisis
Purdue Pharma pleaded guilty Tuesday to three criminal charges, f... [5002 chars]
